languages.text: "Давно не слышал от проктора порицаний дисциплины на мостике. Не то чтобы я жалуюсь, просто отмечаю тревожную перемену".
languages.translation_comment: Romance with Solomorne is in 2nd phase (his remorse over lying to the RT).

traits.locale_text: "Давно не слышал от проктора порицаний дисциплины на мостике. Не то, чтобы я жалуюсь, просто отмечаю тревожную перемену".

languages.text: "It has been some time since I last received any criticism of the discipline on the bridge from the Proctor. Not that I am complaining — merely noticing a worrying change."
languages.translation_comment: Romance with Solomorne is in 2nd phase (his remorse over lying to the RT).
languages.original_text: "Давно не слышал от проктора порицаний дисциплины на мостике. Не то чтобы я жалуюсь, просто отмечаю тревожную перемену".

traits.locale_text: "It has been some time since I last received any criticism of the discipline on the bridge from the Proctor. Not that I am complaining — merely noticing a worrying change."
"It has been some time since I last received any criticism of the discipline on the bridge from the Proctor. Not that I am complaining — merely noticing a worrying change."
"It has been some time since I last received any criticism of the discipline on the bridge from the Proctor. Not that I am complaining — merely noticing a worrying change."
"It has been some time since I last received any criticism of the discipline on the bridge from the Proctor. Not that I am complaining — merely noticing a worrying change."
"It has been some time since I last received any criticism of the discipline on the bridge from the Proctor. Not that I am complaining — merely noticing a worrying change."
"It has been some time since I last received any criticism of the discipline on the bridge from the Proctor. Not that I am complaining — merely noticing a worrying change."

languages.text: 「ブリッジでの規律について、代理人殿からご指摘を受けるのは久しぶりですね。別に文句を言っているわけではありません。少々気がかりな変化ではありますが」
languages.original_text: "It has been some time since I last received any criticism of the discipline on the bridge from the Proctor. Not that I am complaining — merely noticing a worrying change."

traits.locale_text: 「ブリッジでの規律について、代理人殿からご指摘を受けるのは久しぶりですね。別に文句を言っているわけではありません。少々気がかりな変化ではありますが」

languages.text: "Der Proktor hat sich schon lange nicht mehr über die mangelnde Disziplin auf der Brücke beschwert. Nicht, dass ich mich beschweren würde, mir ist nur eine besorgniserregende Veränderung aufgefallen."
languages.original_text: "It has been some time since I last received any criticism of the discipline on the bridge from the Proctor. Not that I am complaining — merely noticing a worrying change."

traits.locale_text: "Der Proktor hat sich schon lange nicht mehr über die mangelnde Disziplin auf der Brücke beschwert. Nicht, dass ich mich beschweren würde, mir ist nur eine besorgniserregende Veränderung aufgefallen."

languages.text: « Cela fait un certain temps que le proctor ne m'a pas fait part de ses critiques concernant la discipline sur la passerelle. Pas que je m'en plaigne, j'ai simplement remarqué ce changement inquiétant d'attitude. »
languages.original_text: "It has been some time since I last received any criticism of the discipline on the bridge from the Proctor. Not that I am complaining — merely noticing a worrying change."

traits.locale_text: « Cela fait un certain temps que le proctor ne m'a pas fait part de ses critiques concernant la discipline sur la passerelle. Pas que je m'en plaigne, j'ai simplement remarqué ce changement inquiétant d'attitude. »

languages.text: «Hace tiempo que el Procurador no protesta por la disciplina en el puente. Tampoco es que me queje, simplemente señalo un cambio preocupante».
languages.original_text: "It has been some time since I last received any criticism of the discipline on the bridge from the Proctor. Not that I am complaining — merely noticing a worrying change."

traits.locale_text: «Hace tiempo que el Procurador no protesta por la disciplina en el puente. Tampoco es que me queje, simplemente señalo un cambio preocupante».

languages.text: “监察官已经有段时间没批评过舰桥的纪律问题了。我倒不是在抱怨什么，但这件事情很让人担忧。”
languages.original_text: "It has been some time since I last received any criticism of the discipline on the bridge from the Proctor. Not that I am complaining — merely noticing a worrying change."

traits.locale_text: “监察官已经有段时间没批评过舰桥的纪律问题了。我倒不是在抱怨什么，但这件事情很让人担忧。”

languages.text: "Üsteğmen'den kaç zamandır köprü disiplinine dair eleştiri duymadım. Şikâyet ettiğimden değil ama endişeleniyorum."
languages.original_text: "It has been some time since I last received any criticism of the discipline on the bridge from the Proctor. Not that I am complaining — merely noticing a worrying change."

traits.locale_text: "Üsteğmen'den kaç zamandır köprü disiplinine dair eleştiri duymadım. Şikâyet ettiğimden değil ama endişeleniyorum."

languages.original_text: "It has been some time since I last received any criticism of the discipline on the bridge from the Proctor. Not that I am complaining — merely noticing a worrying change."
